```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(readxl)
library(janitor)
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
```

```{r reading, echo=FALSE}
enrollment <- read_excel("class_enrollment_summary_by_term2.18.20.xlsx", skip=3) %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  select(course_title, course_name, course_department, total) %>%
  group_by(course_department) %>%
  summarize(enrollees = sum(total)) %>%
  arrange(desc(enrollees)) %>%
  slice(1:5)
  

enrollment
```
